title: First days of life
creator_credit: Claude Edelmann, Boulton-Hawker Films and Les Films du Levant
brief_description: Shows the sequence of a natural childbirth, reviews all facets of the developing foetus and depicts some aspects of the development of the child to the age of three. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Claude Edelmann, Boulton-Hawker Films and Les Films du Levant
